<title>Home page</title>

This is my bash environment.  There are many like it, but this one is mine.

To install:

<verbatim>curl -LsSf http://chiselapp.com/user/nrr/repository/dotfiles-bash-environment/doc/trunk/move-in.sh | sh -</verbatim>

To get your own local copy over secure https, issue the following commands:
<pre>
fossil clone https://chiselapp.com/user/nrr/repository/dotfiles-bash-environment dotfiles-bash-environment.fossil
mkdir dotfiles-bash-environment && cd dotfiles-bash-environment
fossil open ../dotfiles-bash-environment.fossil
</pre>

To get your own local copy over normal http, issue the following commands:
<pre>
fossil clone http://chiselapp.com/user/nrr/repository/dotfiles-bash-environment dotfiles-bash-environment.fossil
mkdir dotfiles-bash-environment && cd dotfiles-bash-environment
fossil open ../dotfiles-bash-environment.fossil
</pre>
